TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract serializable beforefieldinit Attribute extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.InteropServices._Attribute

summary.span: 代表自訂屬性的基底類別。

span.span: Represents the base class for custom attributes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別預先定義的系統資訊或使用者定義自訂的資訊將與相關聯的目標項目。The class associates predefined system information or user-defined custom information with a target element. 目標項目可以是組件、 類別、 建構函式、 委派、 列舉、 事件、 欄位、 介面、 方法、 可攜式執行檔的模組、 參數、 屬性、 傳回值、 結構或另一個屬性。A target element can be an assembly, class, constructor, delegate, enum, event, field, interface, method, portable executable file module, parameter, property, return value, struct, or another attribute. 屬性所提供的資訊就是所謂的中繼資料。Information provided by an attribute is also known as metadata. 中繼資料可在執行階段檢查您的應用程式，來控制您的程式如何處理資料，或在執行階段所控制的外部工具之前如何您本身的應用程式處理或保留。Metadata can be examined at run time by your application to control how your program processes data, or before run time by external tools to control how your application itself is processed or maintained. 例如，.NET Framework 會預先定義和使用屬性類型來控制執行階段行為，而某些程式設計語言使用屬性型別表示不直接支援的.NET Framework 一般型別系統的語言功能。For example, the .NET Framework predefines and uses attribute types to control run-time behavior, and some programming languages use attribute types to represent language features not directly supported by the .NET Framework common type system. 所有的屬性類型直接或間接衍生自類別。All attribute types derive directly or indirectly from the class. 屬性可以套用至任何目標項目;多個屬性可以套用至相同的目標項目;從目標項目衍生的項目可以繼承屬性。Attributes can be applied to any target element; multiple attributes can be applied to the same target element; and attributes can be inherited by an element derived from a target element. 使用類別，以指定要套用屬性的目標項目。Use the class to specify the target element to which the attribute is applied. 類別提供方便的方法，來擷取並測試自訂屬性。The class provides convenient methods to retrieve and test custom attributes. 如需使用屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱[套用屬性](~/docs/standard/attributes/applying-attributes.md)並[屬性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。For more information about using attributes, see [Applying Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/applying-attributes.md) and [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用。The following code example demonstrates the usage of . [!code-cpp[AnimalAttributes#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AnimalAttributes/CPP/customattribute.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AnimalAttributes#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AnimalAttributes/CS/customattribute.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AnimalAttributes#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AnimalAttributes/VB/customattribute.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會使用反映來擷取目前的執行個體的欄位資訊和`obj`引數。The method uses reflection to retrieve field information for the current instance and the `obj` argument. 然後，它會比較欄位值。It then compares field values. 當實作您自己的類別衍生自，您可以覆寫方法。When implementing your own class derived from , you can override the method. 因為它會使用反映，我們建議您這麼做。Because it uses reflection, we recommend that you do so. 不過，覆寫應該執行參考相等 （兩個引數代表相同的物件執行個體） 或實值相等 （兩個引數會屬於相同類型，並具有完全相同的欄位值） 的標準測試。However, your override should perform a standard test for reference equality (the two arguments represent the same object instance) or value equality (the two arguments are of the same type and have identical field values). 如果您想要執行自訂的比較，來決定兩個屬性物件是否相等，您可以覆寫方法。If you want to perform a custom comparison to determine whether two attributes objects are equal, you can override the method. ## Examples 下列範例會定義兩個自訂參數類別，然後建立數個物件的每個類別，並使用方法來比較它們。The following example defines two custom parameter classes, then creates several objects of each class and uses the method to compare them. [!code-cpp[System.Attribute.Equals](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Attribute.Equals/CPP/equals.cpp)] [!code-csharp[System.Attribute.Equals](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Attribute.Equals/CS/equals.cs)] [!code-vb[System.Attribute.Equals](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Attribute.Equals/VB/equals.vb)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，如果您預期要傳回的多個值或就會擲回。Use the method if you expect more than one value to be returned, or will be thrown. > [!NOTE] > 從.NET Framework 2.0 版開始，這個方法傳回的安全性屬性，如果屬性儲存在新的中繼資料格式。Starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0, this method returns security attributes if the attributes are stored in the new metadata format. 使用版本 2.0 或更新版本所編譯的組件會使用新的格式。Assemblies compiled with version 2.0 or later use the new format. 動態組件和舊版的.NET Framework 編譯的組件使用舊的 XML 格式。Dynamic assemblies and assemblies compiled with earlier versions of the .NET Framework use the old XML format. 請參閱[發出的宣告式安全性屬性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9eeddee8-ca89-4440-b84b-fd613f590cd5)。See [Emitting Declarative Security Attributes](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9eeddee8-ca89-4440-b84b-fd613f590cd5). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何將方法採用做為參數。The following code example illustrates the use of the method taking an as a parameter. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會判斷如果等於另一個。This method determines if one equals another. 其預設實作是與相同，以決定是否兩個屬性都屬於相同的型別，並擁有相同的欄位值。Its default implementation is the same as , which determines whether two attributes are of the same type and have the same field values. 一般情況下，方法是執行一般測試的參考或實值相等性。In general, the method is intended to perform a standard test for reference or value equality. 您可以覆寫時您想要執行自訂的比較，會根據一些準則以外的其他兩個屬性執行個體是否相等的方法都屬於相同的型別，而且有 identifical 值。You can override the method when you want to perform a custom comparison for equality that is based on some criteria other than that two attribute instances are of the same type and have identifical values. 例如，您可以覆寫方法來比較在下列案例中的屬性：For example, you can override the method to compare attributes in the following scenarios: - 屬性包含位元欄位，以及您考慮兩個屬性執行個體相等，是否已設定特定的位元。An attribute includes a bit field, and you consider two attribute instances equal if a particular bit is set. 比方說，`NumericDisplay`屬性可能包含位元欄位，指出哪些數字的格式 （例如二進位、 八進位、 十進位和十六進位） 用戶端支援。For example, a `NumericDisplay` attribute might include a bit field that indicates what numeric formats (such as binary, octal, decimal, and hexadecimal) a client supports. 覆寫方法可能會考慮兩個執行個體相等，是否它們支援相同的數值格式。The overridden method might consider two instances equal if they support the same numeric format. - 屬性包含多個欄位包含相同類型的詳細資訊，或是包含以任何順序值可以是的陣列。An attribute includes multiple fields that contain the same kind of information, or it contains an array in which values can be in any order. 比方說，`Author`屬性可能包含多個欄位的作者名稱。For example, an `Author` attribute might include multiple fields for author names. 覆寫方法可能會考慮兩個執行個體相等，是否它們有相同的作者，不論每個欄位是等於對應的欄位。The overridden method might consider two instances equal if they have the same authors regardless of whether each field is equal to the corresponding field. ## 範例Example 下列範例示範如何將來建立自訂的比較方法的屬性值。The following example illustrates the use of to create a custom comparison method for attribute values. 如果定義`AuthorsAttribute`，在內部包含`List`儲存作者姓名。If defines an `AuthorsAttribute` that internally contains a `List` that stores authors' names. 因為名稱可能會發生在清單中的任何順序，其會覆寫方法來比較作者名稱，不論其清單中的位置。Because the names can occur in any order in the list, it overrides the method to compare author names regardless of their position in the list. 附註方法，它會執行測試的值是否相等，傳回不同的結果從方法。Note the method, which performs a test for value equality, returns different results from the method. [!code-csharp[Match#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Match/CS/match.cs)] [!code-vb[Match#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Match/VB/match.vb)]
